After fast-forwarding or skipping ahead, too many ads pop up‚Äîvery frustrating.
The ‚Äúresume where I left off‚Äù function is confusing, so I often don‚Äôt know where I stopped.
Unless these UX issues are fixed‚Äîlayout, ad-frequency, episode metadata‚Äîviewers may move away from Aha.

reviews.author: Manish QA
reviews.title: To QA Team of aha
reviews.text:
Dear QA Team of Aha, please review the below issues and request your tech team to make the below betterments and try to enhance the application better.

Device Tested: iPhone 11

Defect ID: D-001

Title: Forward button (10 sec) not visually displaying properly
Description:
When tapping the 10-second forward button while playing a video, the UI display is not visually clear. The button animation/indicator does not give a proper forward effect, leading to a poor user experience.

Steps to Reproduce:
	1.	Open the application on iPhone 11.
	2.	Play any video.
	3.	Tap the 10s forward button.

Expected Result:
The video should move forward by 10 seconds and the UI should clearly indicate the forward action.

Actual Result:
The forward action is performed, but the UI is visually unclear and does not provide proper feedback.

Severity: Low
Priority: Medium

‚∏ª

Defect ID: D-002

Title: Unable to forward video beyond 20 seconds; background stream continues
Description:
When attempting to forward a video for more than 20 seconds, the stream does not behave as expected. Instead of resuming from the forwarded position (e.g., +10s from current timestamp), the video continues streaming in the background. This creates confusion as playback behavior is inconsistent. Issue has been observed repeatedly over the past few months.

Steps to Reproduce:
	1.	Open the application on iPhone 11.
	2.	Play any video.
	3.	Continuously tap the forward button to skip more than 20 seconds.

Expected Result:
The video should pause streaming and resume from the new forwarded timestamp.

Actual Result:
The video continues to stream in the background without resuming properly from the forwarded position.

Severity: High
Priority: High

‚∏ª

Defect ID: D-003

Title: Rewind/Forward buttons become disabled after multiple clicks; stream continues in background
Description:
When attempting to rewind a video to an earlier timestamp (e.g., from 17:40 back to 16:20), the rewind and forward buttons become disabled after 2 clicks. Although the video stream continues to play in the background, the user loses control over navigation, causing confusion.

Steps to Reproduce:
	1.	Open the application on iPhone 11.
	2.	Play a video and go to a later point (e.g., 17:40).
	3.	Attempt to rewind back to 16:20 by clicking the rewind button multiple times.

Expected Result:
The video should rewind smoothly to the selected timestamp, and controls should remain active.

Actual Result:
After 2 clicks, the rewind/forward buttons become disabled while the video continues streaming in the background.

Severity: High
Priority: High

‚∏ª

Defect ID: D-004

Title: Application response time is laggy during video playback
Description:
The application shows noticeable lag while playing videos. The response time for user actions (play, pause, forward, rewind) is delayed, leading to an unsmooth playback experience.

Steps to Reproduce:
	1.	Open the application on iPhone 11.
	2.	Play any video.
	3.	Interact with playback controls (play, pause, forward, rewind).

Expected Result:
The application should respond instantly to user actions, providing smooth playback.

Actual Result:
The application is slow to respond, resulting in lag and poor user experience.

Severity: High
Priority: High

raw.title: Pilipinas Live
raw.description:
Watch live games, catch up on highlights, news and exclusive videos from top sports leagues in the Philippines. Subscribe for premium access to enjoy all the action from anywhere on any digital screen.

KEY FEATURES:
‚óè Live and Upcoming Filipino Sports Content: Discover the ultimate Filipino sports content with our live and upcoming games, so you can catch up on the go.

‚óè Enjoy live games tailored to your preferences: Delve into the complete game experience, including extended pre and post-game coverage; Watch with multiple screens, granting you the ability to witness extraordinary plays
from various camera angles; Gain fresh insights from special hosts and distinguished guests who provide unique perspectives on the game, while also having the opportunity to share your own opinions.

‚óè Have control on how you watch the game: Pause, restart, or rewinding live and on demand content to make sure you do not miss a thing.

‚óè Personalized Experience: Build your own list of favorite games and leagues and sign up for even more benefits to personalize your viewing experience.

‚óè Stay informed and share your reactions: Get the latest sports news, scores, stats, and standings and share your comments and reactions with the available interactive features, and more.

raw.description:
Unifi TV app is home to live channels and 20 streaming apps like Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar, Max, Viu and more. FREE download, FREE registration ‚Äì just use your mobile number (available for everyone in Malaysia!).‚Äã

If you‚Äôre a Unifi TV customer, link your Unifi TV account (example@iptv) to unlock all your entitlements.‚Äã

Here are some of the perks you can enjoy:‚Äã
- Enjoy sample basic channels with no strings attached. When you're ready for more, explore our attractive channel packs‚Äã
- View and access your favourite shows & movies across all channels and streaming apps.‚Äã
- Watch the latest blockbuster movies, fresh from the cinema, on U PICK‚Äã.
- Create multiple profiles ‚Äì because who likes their algorithms being messed up?‚Äã
- Download on multiple devices ‚Äì iPhone and iPad. (If your device isn't compatible, maybe it‚Äôs time for an upgrade? Just kidding!)‚Äã

What to watch, you say? Here‚Äôs our award-winning list: ‚Äã
- Blockbuster movies‚Äã
- Exclusive Unifi TV Originals series & movies‚Äã
- Express drama series & reality shows‚Äã
- Live sports action‚Äã
- Cartoons & animation‚Äã
- Documentaries & lifestyle programmes‚Äã
- 24/7 global news coverage‚Äã

Best viewed over a Wi-Fi connection. Mobile operator charges may apply.‚Äã
Content rights for the Unifi TV app are limited to use within Malaysia.‚Äã

We welcome any questions, comments or suggestions at help@unifi.com.my.‚Äã
Follow Unifi on Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and X. Visit www.unifi.com.my/tv for the latest info and promotions.

reviews.title: Good upgrade but can be better
reviews.text:
I like the new interface however after using it for a month on the new unifi tv box, there‚Äôs some things I think could be better for future improvements:

1. Once you open a channel to watch, you can only press up to choose the language/subtitle. But you have to do it each time you watch a new show. The app doesn‚Äôt save your preference of what language/subtitle you choose which is a hassle.

2. The options while watching a tv channel can be better. Instead of pressing the channel to go back and choose different channels, why not make the scroll button open up a selection of options i.e
- down to open up selection of channels in simple list(like old unifi tv app or the blue button on white hypptv box)
- up to open language/subtitle settings
- ok button to open the current channel info (channel name, description, time slot etc like simple info list.

Hope to see more improvements going forward for unifi.

reviews.title: Not user friendly 2.0!
reviews.text:
Extremely frustrated with this new interface. When I want to go Live TV via the TV Guide it immediately lands into the channel at the top, video playing at once and at loud volume. The previous interface allowed me to scroll thru the channels I wanted easily  without video playing at all. 

Plus all the Disney and HBO Max icons - I click on it, goes to outside app n then asks me to sign in - with what ID?? I tried all the Unifi ID n can‚Äôt even get in!

Very frustrating, not user friendly

reviews.author: Gangubaiketiakwadi
reviews.title: Tolong baiki aplikasi versi TV
reviews.text:
Yang komen 1 bintang semua menghadapi masalah dengan aplikasi versi tv yang sangat tidak mesra pengguna,, apapun aplikasi versi mobile, tab, dan pc tiada bnyk isu dan berjalan normal bahkan boleh dianggap satu naik taraf yang bagus untuk versi mobile,tab,dan pc.. versi TV tolong dibaiki lagi ya.

Antara yg perlu dibaiki versi TV,
 1)adalah sistem siaran tv automatic perlu dimainkan di background apabila buka aplikasi unifi tv 2.0 seperti unifitv1.0 dulu.
2)memilih siaran tv dari dalam siaran tv perlu lebih senang, tapi jangan buang epg sedia ada. Sbb epg sedia ada senang nk cari catchup terlepas beberapa jam lepas..
3)menonton dari sesi terakhir kali perlu diperbaiki agar apps tak lag bila dibuka semula.

Saranan yg boleh sy syorkan untuk masalah no 2, letak nombor pada setiap channel atau baiki button up/down pada remote anda untuk tukar channel bukan button left/ right seperti skrg ni, button left/right tu boleh letak kotak2 channel last watched ke atau biarkan kosong. Ganti remote yang ada nombor.

tak nak ikut saranan pun takpala janji fixkan 3 masalah utama itu ikut la macam mana pun,,saya pasti yang komen negatif semua menghadapi masalah yang sama .. sekian‚Ä¶.

raw.title: Unifi TV 2.0
raw.description: Unifi TV app is home to live channels and 20 streaming apps like Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar, Max, Viu and more. FREE download, FREE registration ‚Äì just use your mobile number (available for everyone in Malaysia!). If you‚Äôre a Unifi TV customer, link your Unifi TV account (example@iptv) to unlock all your entitlements. Here are some of the perks you can enjoy: ‚Ä¢ No strings attached to sample basic channels. When you‚Äôre ready for more, check out our attractive packs. ‚Ä¢ View and access your favourite shows & movies across all channels and streaming apps. ‚Ä¢ Rent the latest blockbuster movies straight from the cinema on U PICK. ‚Ä¢ Create multiple profiles ‚Äì because who likes their algorithms being messed up? ‚Ä¢ Download on multiple devices ‚Äì mobile, tablets, Android TV boxes and smart TVs. (If your device isn't compatible, maybe it‚Äôs time for an upgrade? Just kidding!) What to watch, you say? Here‚Äôs our award-winning list: ‚Äã ‚Ä¢ Blockbuster movies ‚Ä¢ Exclusive Unifi TV Originals series & movies ‚Ä¢ Express drama series & reality shows ‚Ä¢ Live sports action ‚Ä¢ Cartoons & animation ‚Ä¢ Documentaries & lifestyle programmes ‚Ä¢ 24/7 global news coverage Best viewed over a Wi-Fi connection. Mobile operator charges may apply.‚Äã Content rights for the Unifi TV app are limited to use within Malaysia. We welcome any questions, comments or suggestions at help@unifi.com.my.‚Äã Follow Unifi on Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and X. Visit www.unifi.com.my/tv for the latest info and promotions. ‚Äã
raw.descriptionHTML:
Unifi TV app is home to live channels and 20 streaming apps like Netflix, Disney+ Hotstar, Max, Viu and more. FREE download, FREE registration ‚Äì just use your mobile number (available for everyone in Malaysia!).

If you‚Äôre a Unifi TV customer, link your Unifi TV account (example@iptv) to unlock all your entitlements.

Here are some of the perks you can enjoy:
‚Ä¢ No strings attached to sample basic channels. When you‚Äôre ready for more, check out our attractive packs.
‚Ä¢ View and access your favourite shows & movies across all channels and streaming apps.
‚Ä¢ Rent the latest blockbuster movies straight from the cinema on U PICK.
‚Ä¢ Create multiple profiles ‚Äì because who likes their algorithms being messed up?
‚Ä¢ Download on multiple devices ‚Äì mobile, tablets, Android TV boxes and smart TVs. (If your device isn't compatible, maybe it‚Äôs time for an upgrade? Just kidding!)

What to watch, you say? Here‚Äôs our award-winning list: ‚Äã
‚Ä¢ Blockbuster movies
‚Ä¢ Exclusive Unifi TV Originals series & movies
‚Ä¢ Express drama series & reality shows
‚Ä¢ Live sports action
‚Ä¢ Cartoons & animation
‚Ä¢ Documentaries & lifestyle programmes
‚Ä¢ 24/7 global news coverage

Best viewed over a Wi-Fi connection. Mobile operator charges may apply.‚Äã
Content rights for the Unifi TV app are limited to use within Malaysia.

We welcome any questions, comments or suggestions at help@unifi.com.my.‚Äã
